[`Vault`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Vault.md) â€º [`rename`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Vault/rename.md)

## Vault.rename() method

Rename or move a file. To ensure links are automatically renamed, use [FileManager.renameFile()](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/FileManager/renameFile.md) instead.

**Signature:**

```typescript
rename(file: TAbstractFile, newPath: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>file</code> | [`TAbstractFile`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/TAbstractFile.md) | the file to rename/move |
|  <code>newPath</code> | <code>string</code> | vault absolute path to move file to. |

**Returns:**

`Promise``<void>`
